backend/main.mo: Main actor for the café billing app defining menu items, categories, orders, and user profiles with persistent state, access control mixins, and a hardcoded menu dataset.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines the Actor state shape and exports a no-op `run` function for state migration between upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'Clear All Data' admin button feature to its implementing files and associated test/component metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing each component, hook, and utility's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS with OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Café Billing & Menu Manager' that mounts the React app via a root div and module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining all app routes (order, bill, reports, menu, menu-management, order-details) under a shared AppLayout root with an index redirect to /order.
frontend/src/components/bill/BillItemsTa: Renders a receipt-style table of order items with quantity, unit price, and line total using bigint arithmetic and formatCurrency.
Print-optimized receipt layout for Simple Sips Cafe showing logo, bill header, items table, subtotal/discount/total, and a footer — all props typed as bigint.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Sticky-header app shell with Internet Identity auth button, admin role badge, admin-only Menu Management link, and a bottom Navigation bar rendered via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with three tabs (Order, Menu, Reports) using TanStack Router links, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/menu/ClearAllDat: Provides a destructive confirmation dialog that triggers a mutation to permanently delete all orders, menu items, and user profiles, with loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/menu/DeleteMenuI: Renders a confirmation alert dialog for deleting a single menu item by name, calling an onConfirm callback and showing a loading state.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Displays a list of menu items under a category heading, with inline edit (dialog + form) and delete (confirmation dialog) controls visible to admins.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemFor: A reusable form for creating or editing a menu item with name, price, and category fields (supporting preset or custom categories), including validation and loading state.
frontend/src/components/order-details/Or: Renders a styled card showing a finalized order's items in a table with per-line totals, plus a footer summarizing subtotal, optional discount, and grand total.
frontend/src/components/order/CategoryGr: Displays a grid of food category buttons with emoji icons and per-category gradient backgrounds, falling back to a rotating palette for unknown categories.
frontend/src/components/order/CategoryIt: Displays a filtered grid of menu items for a selected category, with a back button and optional search input.
frontend/src/components/order/DeleteOrde: Renders a confirmation alert dialog for deleting the current order, showing item count and a loading state during deletion.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuCatego: Collapsible accordion component that groups and displays menu items under a category header, auto-expanding when a search filter is active.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuItemCa: Card component for a single menu item showing its name, price, quantity in order, and an add button.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderItemR: Row component for an order item with increment, decrement, and remove controls alongside the line total.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderSumma: Renders a list of OrderItemRow components for all items in the active order; returns null when the order is empty.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderTotal: Displays subtotal, an editable discount input, and the final total for the current order.
frontend/src/components/reports/DailySum: Shows today's total revenue and items sold in two summary cards, with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateRang: Provides start and end date inputs with an apply button for filtering report data by date range.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateWise: Displays a table of sales grouped by date, showing bill count and revenue per day, with a skeleton loader.
frontend/src/components/reports/ItemWise: Displays an all-time item-wise sales table with quantity sold and revenue per menu item, with a skeleton loader.
frontend/src/components/reports/MonthlyS: Displays a monthly sales summary table with order count and revenue per month, with a skeleton loader.
frontend/src/components/reports/Previous: Shows yesterday's revenue and items sold in two summary cards, with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/data/publicMenu.ts: Defines static typed data for a public-facing café menu, organized into categories (Tea, Coffee, Sandwiches, etc.) with item names and prices in rupees.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRole.ts: React hook that queries the backend to determine if the currently authenticated user has admin privileges, returning isAdmin and isLoading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider for React, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderState.ts: React hook that manages local order state including items, quantities, and discounts, with helpers to add/update/remove items, compute subtotal and total, and serialize to backend OrderItem format.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks and mutations for menu items, categories, orders, and sales data, along with category ordering/display-name utilities for the café backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that configures Tailwind CSS, defines a warm café-themed OKLCH color palette with light/dark modes, sets typography, enforces minimum tap target sizes, and includes print styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging (cn), currency/date formatting, nanosecond conversion, and menu category ordering/display name mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BillView.tsx: Page that reads bill data from sessionStorage, parses it, and renders a printable bill layout with print and new-order actions.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagement.tsx: Admin page for managing menu items and categories, supporting add/edit/delete operations via React Query mutations with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetails.tsx: Authenticated page that fetches and displays all finalized orders in reverse chronological order, with loading skeletons and an auth guard.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTaking.tsx: Main order-taking page that uses a static menu, manages cart state, and finalizes orders by saving to the backend and navigating to the bill view.
frontend/src/pages/PublicMenu.tsx: Renders a public-facing café menu page with a hero header, sticky category filter pills, and a scrollable list of menu items grouped by category, all sourced from a static PUBLIC_MENU data file.
frontend/src/pages/SalesReports.tsx: Displays a tabbed sales reports page with Daily, Items, Monthly, and Dates tabs, each rendering a corresponding report component, plus a link to the order details page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a café-themed design system with custom colors (espresso, latte, cream, amber), fonts, border radii, shadows, and animations, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state including existing features and pending feature requests; currently records a completed 'Clear All Data' frontend button feature and a pending backend `clearAllData` function request.
